snippet.title: Cat Stories: New Year Trailer (PC, iOS, Android)
snippet.description:
A small interactive game in the genre of hidden objects about a cat who slept through everything and now has to prepare for the New Year in the shortest possible time, while the owner is not at home. Puzzles, mini-games and a festive mood await you.

Features:
- 4 detailed rooms - prepare them all
- 3 different mini-games
- Lots of animations and animated shorts
- Nice hand-drawn graphics
- Cute and adorable cat
- References to your favorite movies, games and anime. Find them for extra points
- New Year and festive mood

Available right now for:
PC - https://curiousfoxes.itch.io/catstories-newyear
App Store - https://apps.apple.com/us/app/cat-stories-new-year/id1540955013
Google Play - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.curiousfoxes.cat
